ComicInfo.Title: The Grand Alliance! Or Life with Loki!!!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Grand Alliance! Or Life with Loki!!!: Thor, still under Lorelei's spell, makes his bid to put Loki in power and strikes Sif at his lover's command; Lorelei, still enamored of Loki, returns to her true love. Thanks to the wiles of the Enchantress, Thor catches his half-brother and his girl in bed and Lorelei's hold over him is broken. The Asgardians return home from Midgard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:30:28. [Issue ID 40447]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Louise Simonson,Nico and his father (from Detective Comics),Heimdall,Walter Simonson,the Warriors Three [Hogun,Lorelei,Sif,Thor,Beta Ray Bill,Hildy,the Executioner,the Enchantress,Loki,Volstagg],Frigga,Fandral
